mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComOvseaDlvZoneNation Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , ZONE_TURN , DLV_NATION_CD , OVSEA_DLV_MN_SECT_CD , CNTINT_SECT_CD , DLV_PSB_NATION_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_OVSEA_DLV_ZONE_NATION WHERE 1 = 1 AND OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN = #{ovseaDlvCstPlcSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND ZONE_TURN = #{zoneTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND DLV_NATION_CD = #{dlvNationCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND OVSEA_DLV_MN_SECT_CD = #{ovseaDlvMnSectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
